CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS silver;

-- ============================================
-- 1. Rejestracja danych z Bronze jako widok tymczasowy
-- ============================================
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW bronze_pos
USING parquet
OPTIONS (
  path 'abfss://bronze@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/Erp/inventory_pos_history_details'
);
-- ============================================
-- 2. Przygotowanie danych – najnowsze update + agregacja miesięczna
-- ============================================
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW aggregated_bronze_pos AS
SELECT 
    product_id,
    country_id,
    max(update_date) as pos_update_date,    
    TRUNC(transaction_date, "MM") AS transaction_date,
    SUM(pos_sell_out_quantity) AS pos_sell_out_quantity,
    SUM(pos_open_quantity) AS pos_open_quantity,
    SUM(pos_end_quantity) AS pos_end_quantity,
    ROUND(SUM(pos_sell_out_quantity * unit_price), 2) AS pos_sell_out_amount,
    ROUND(SUM(pos_open_quantity * unit_price), 2) AS pos_open_amount,
    ROUND(SUM(pos_end_quantity * unit_price), 2) AS pos_end_amount,
    ROUND(SUM(pos_sell_out_quantity * unit_price) / NULLIF(SUM(pos_sell_out_quantity), 0), 2) AS unit_price
FROM  bronze_pos
GROUP BY product_id, country_id, TRUNC(transaction_date, "MM");


-- ============================================
-- 3. Stworzenie tabeli docelowej (Silver) jeśli nie istnieje
-- ============================================
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS silver.f_pos_data
USING delta
LOCATION 'abfss://silver@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/f_pos_data'
AS
SELECT * FROM aggregated_bronze_pos
WHERE 1 = 0;


CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW filter_aggregated_bronze_pos AS
SELECT * from aggregated_bronze_pos n 
where  NOT EXISTS (select product_id From silver.f_pos_data s 
                    where s.product_id =n.product_id 
                      and s.country_id = n.country_id
                      and s.pos_update_date = n.pos_update_date
                      and s.transaction_date = n.transaction_date);



-- ============================================
-- 4. MERGE INTO (UPSERT) danych do tabeli Delta
-- ============================================

MERGE INTO silver.f_pos_data AS target
USING filter_aggregated_bronze_pos AS source
ON target.product_id = source.product_id
   AND target.country_id = source.country_id
   AND target.transaction_date = source.transaction_date

WHEN MATCHED THEN
  UPDATE SET
    target.pos_sell_out_quantity = source.pos_sell_out_quantity,
    target.pos_open_quantity = source.pos_open_quantity,
    target.pos_end_quantity = source.pos_end_quantity,
    target.pos_sell_out_amount = source.pos_sell_out_amount,
    target.pos_open_amount = source.pos_open_amount,
    target.pos_end_amount = source.pos_end_amount,
    target.unit_price = source.unit_price,
    target.pos_update_date = source.pos_update_date 

WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
  INSERT (
    product_id,
    country_id,
    transaction_date,
    pos_sell_out_quantity,
    pos_open_quantity,
    pos_end_quantity,
    pos_sell_out_amount,
    pos_open_amount,
    pos_end_amount,
    unit_price,
    pos_update_date 
  )
  VALUES (
    source.product_id,
    source.country_id,
    source.transaction_date,
    source.pos_sell_out_quantity,
    source.pos_open_quantity,
    source.pos_end_quantity,
    source.pos_sell_out_amount,
    source.pos_open_amount,
    source.pos_end_amount,
    source.unit_price,
    source.pos_update_date 
  );
